Song.title: Across The Great Divide
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Mark Altrogge © 2001 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [C#m | A | B | F#]
Verse 1: There is [C#m]no more sepa[A]ration, there is [B]no more need to [F#]hide You have [C#m]brought us near, O [A]Jesus, ac[E]ross the great div[F#]ide There is [C#m]no more condem[A]nation Since the [B]blood flowed from Your [F#]side You have [C#m]brought us near, O [A]Jesus Ac[E]ross the great div[F# | A2 | A2]ide
Chorus: Oh [E]glory [A]to Your [C#m]holy [A]name [E]For the [A]distance [D]that You came To [E]bear my [A]guilt and [C#m]take my [A]blame To [F#]save me [A2] From [E]heaven [A]to a [C#m]cross of [A]pain [E]Oh the [A]distance [D]that You came So [E]I will [A2]love You [C#m]without [A2]shame You [F#]saved me,[A2] [ ]You [F#]saved me [A2 |]
Verse 2: There is [C#m]no more fear of [A]judgment, the Father’s [B]wrath is satis[F#]fied You have [C#m]brought us near, O [A]Jesus, ac[E]ross the great di[F#]vide There’s a [C#m]way beyond the [A]curtain Through our [B]Priest and King on [F#]high You have [C#m]brought us near, O [A]Jesus Ac[E]ross the great [F# | A2 | A2]divide
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 there is no more separation there is no more need to hide you have brought us near o jesus across the great divide there is no more condemnation since the blood flowed from your side you have brought us near o jesus across the great divide chorus oh glory to your holy name for the distance that you came to bear my guilt and take my blame to save me from heaven to a cross of pain oh the distance that you came so i will love you without shame you saved me you saved me verse 2 there is no more fear of judgment the fathers wrath is satisfied you have brought us near o jesus across the great divide theres a way beyond the curtain through our priest and king on high you have brought us near o jesus across the great divide
